events.name: Rapidly expanding demand for minerals
events.wd_description: The rapid adoption of electric vehicles is driving up demand for critical minerals such as lithium, nickel, cobalt, manganese, graphite, and rare earth elements.
events.description: The rapid adoption of electric vehicles is driving up demand for critical minerals such as lithium, nickel, cobalt, manganese, graphite, and rare earth elements.

events.name: Lithium demand surge
events.wd_description: The global demand for lithium is expected to increase by up to 89 times current demand by 2050.
events.description: The global demand for lithium is expected to increase by up to 89 times current demand by 2050.

events.name: Supply chain constraints
events.wd_description: Rapidly expanding demand, combined with supply chain constraints, is driving up prices for critical minerals.
events.description: Rapidly expanding demand, combined with supply chain constraints, is driving up prices for critical minerals.

events.name: Mined raw materials as anchor of manufacturing value chains
events.wd_label: Mined raw materials as anchor of manufacturing value chains
events.wd_description: Mined raw materials are the foundation of all manufacturing value chains, including those for electric vehicles.
events.description: Mined raw materials are the foundation of all manufacturing value chains, including those for electric vehicles.

events.name: Lithium extraction
events.wd_description: Lithium is extracted from mined ore through various processes such as pyrometallurgy, hydrometallurgy, bioleaching, and direct recycling.
events.description: Lithium is extracted from mined ore through various processes such as pyrometallurgy, hydrometallurgy, bioleaching, and direct recycling.

events.name: Nickel extraction
events.wd_description: Nickel is extracted from mined ore through various processes such as pyrometallurgy, hydrometallurgy, bioleaching, and direct recycling.
events.description: Nickel is extracted from mined ore through various processes such as pyrometallurgy, hydrometallurgy, bioleaching, and direct recycling.

events.name: Cobalt extraction
events.wd_description: Cobalt is extracted from mined ore through various processes such as pyrometallurgy, hydrometallurgy, bioleaching, and direct recycling.
events.description: Cobalt is extracted from mined ore through various processes such as pyrometallurgy, hydrometallurgy, bioleaching, and direct recycling.
